text_logic_form: The figure $ABC$ is an isosceles triangle.
Find the length of the line $AB$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: The figure $ABC$ is an isosceles triangle.
Find the length of the line $AB$.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $BA$ is $9x-1$.
The length of the line $CA$ is $4x+1$.
The length of the line $CB$ is $5x-0.5$.
The length of the line $CA$ is equal to the length of the line $BC$.
line_instances: There are lines $BA$, $CA$, and $CB$ forming the isosceles triangle.
